#summary The iframe element represents an inline frame.
#labels about-html,is-html-element,from-w3c

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HTMLReference HTML Reference] > [HTMLElements Elements] > *iframe element*

== Usage ==

[SpecificationHTML4 HTML 4] says, "The IFRAME element allows authors to insert a frame within a block of text. The information to be inserted inline is designated by the [IframeSrcAttribute src attribute].  The contents of the IFRAME element, on the other hand, should only be displayed by user agents that do not support frames or are configured not to display frames."
